about.personality: Mocha is a gentle and curious soul who loves exploring every corner of the house. He's incredibly affectionate and always greets his humans at the door.

sleepSpot: The sunny spot by the window

quirks: Chirps at birds through the window
Loves to knock things off tables
Has a specific meow for dinner time
Sits like a loaf when content

routine.wakeUp: 6:00 AM - Morning stretches and window watching
routine.breakfast: 7:00 AM - Wet food and fresh water
routine.napTime: 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM - Extended nap in favourite spots
routine.dinner: 6:00 PM - Second meal of the day
routine.bedtime: 10:00 PM - Settles down for the night
